document_data.name: Werond Torophar
document_data.mainbody: '''Werond Torophar''' was a teamster on the [[Sword Coast]] just before the [[Tyranny of Dragons]].
document_data.Personality: Werond was a quiet but romantic woman. She mastered her animals like no other on the [[Trade Way]], but at heart she was a starry-eyed romantic, capable of making strong men cry over her tales of unlucky past loves.
document_data.History: Werond was one of the best teamsters in the [[Western Heartlands]]. At the start of the [[Tyranny of Dragons]], inÂ [[1489 DR]] she acted as lead teamster for a great caravan that, unbeknownst to her, was full of agents of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] transporting treasures for the [[Hoard of the Dragon Queen]].
